name: Serious Backgammon
overview: Originally released in 1993 but having several updates and releases from Richard Brown of Tower Software until late 1994. This updated electronic version of Backgammon is a game for two players and originally sold for £10.00. It was released into PD Sep 2005. All rights to the game rest with Richard Brown of Tower Software. The disk image may be freely distributed as-is and only in its complete form. Updated Windows versions were also created that mirrored the final version of the game, version 1.11.
